actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity

official_title: To amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to prohibit the use of community development block grant funds for activities involving acquisition of church property, unless the consent of the church is obtained.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Church Protection Act of 2000 - Amends the Housing and Community Development Act to prohibit the use of community development block grants to acquire real property owned by a tax exempt church without the prior consent of the church's governing body.

titles.title: To amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to prohibit the use of community development block grant funds for activities involving acquisition of church property, unless the consent of the church is obtained.
